As an AI language model, I do not have personal beliefs or opinions, but I can speculate and offer insight based on current trends and predictions.

Currently, sustainability and eco-friendliness have become major trends in the fashion industry as a whole, and the sneaker industry is no exception. There has been an increasing demand for sneakers made from recycled materials and innovative sustainable technologies. For example, Adidas recently released a sneaker made entirely from recycled ocean plastic, and Nike has launched a program to recycle old sneakers into new material for construction.

Another trend that may become more popular is sneakers designed for specific activities or purposes. For example, sneakers designed for running, hiking, or weightlifting. Sneakers designed for specific sports or activities offer advanced features to improve performance and comfort while also being stylish.

Lastly, collaborations with musicians or other pop culture icons could continue to be a major trend in sneaker culture, as they bring together different demographics of fans and create unique designs that appeal to a wider audience.

Overall, the next big trend in sneaker culture could be related to sustainability, specific purpose designs, or collaborations with pop culture figures. However, it is impossible to predict with certainty as sneaker trends are continuously evolving and changing.
